body:
<CAMERA id="cam" controls="true" width="100%" height="100%"
    onsuccess="" 
    onfail="alert('We were unable to access your camera, please enter your details or try again.')">
    <!-- Picture-In-Picture  -->
    <POS bottom="15" right="15" visible="=!noe({cam.data.file})">
        <BOX expand="false" width="30%" border="all" bordercolor="amber" radius="5">
            <IMAGE url="{cam.data.file}"/>
        </BOX>
    </POS>
</CAMERA>
CAMERA (w/ Picture-In-Picture) [FML].description: A camera view with a picture-in-picture view of the last photo taken

<POST id="postbroker" url="${1}" 
onsuccess="toast('Image Uploaded')" 
onfail="toast('Image Failed to Upload: {postbroker.statusmessage}')">
    <BODY>
        <![CDATA[{cam.data.file}]]>
    </BODY>
</POST>
<CAMERA id="cam" enabled="=!{postbroker.busy}" controls="true"  width="100%" height="100%"
    onsuccess="postbroker.start();" 
    onfail="toast('Access your camera is blocked, you may need to adjust your privacy settings.', 10)">
    <CENTER>
        <BUSY id="busy" visible="={postbroker.busy}" width="100%" height="100%"/>
    </CENTER>
</CAMERA>
CAMERA (Camera Image upload via HTTP POS.description: A full example of camera with a HTTP POST image upload

<SOCKET id="socket" url="wss://${1}?bytes={cam.data.size}" autoexecute="true"
    onsuccess="toast('Image Uploaded');"
    onfail="toast('Image Failed to Upload: {socket.statusmessage}');">
    <BODY>
        <![CDATA[{cam.data.file}]]>
    </BODY>
</SOCKET>

<CAMERA id="cam" enabled="=!{socket.busy}" controls="true"  width="100%" height="100%"
    onsuccess="socket.send();" 
    onfail="alert('We were unable to access your camera, please enter your details or try again.')">
    <CENTER>
        <!-- If the backend supports response codes you can set the visibility of busy on camera's onsuccess and socket's onsuccess/fail -->
        <!-- <BUSY id="busy" visible="false" width="100%" height="100%"/> -->
        <!-- If the backend supports responses you can send the % uploaded in the message -->
        <!-- <TEXT style="h5" bold="true" value="{socket.data.message}" color="amber" elevation="1" halign="center" /> -->
    </CENTER>
</CAMERA>
